newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks seen mixed ahead of holiday.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks seen mixed ahead of holiday.

text.p: Pakistani stocks are likely to open mixed on Sunday amid squaring of positions ahead of a local religious holiday, dealers said.
"No major movement is likely in the index," dealer Dawar Hassan of Global Securities said. He said most investors preferred to stay square ahead of Monday's holiday.
On Thursday, the Karachi Stock Exchange 100-share index fell 14.72 points, or one percent, to end at 1,460.58. Losers led gainers 159 to 96.
Turnover rose to 40.75 million shares from 40.56 million in the previous session. -- Ovais Subhani 9221-5685192
